text: Haddii aad labadiinnu (Xafsah iyo Caa'ishah) Allaah u toobad keenaysaan, haddaba dhabtii qalbiyadiinnu waxay dubra u iisheen (arrinkaa: inaad dambi dhaaaf dalabtaan); haddiise aad isu kaalmey- sataan isaga lidkiis, haddaba hubaal, Allaah baa ah Gargaarahiis iyo Jibriil iyo mu’miniinta wanaagsan, _oo malaa’igta (kale) baa intaas kaddib garab u ah
